Title: Requires grocery stores that offer digital coupons automatically apply such coupons for senior citizens
Summary: Requires grocery stores that offer digital coupons automatically apply such coupons for senior citizens and loyalty or rewards program members.
LawCode: Add ยง396-ccc, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring grocery stores that offer digital coupons automatically apply such coupons for senior citizens and loyalty or rewards program members
